author: Charles Creitz
title: FDA director dismisses claim agency 'squandered months' of virus prep
description: Food and Drug Administration Commissioner Dr. Stephen Hahn responded to a claim from President Obama's Centers for Disease Control chief, who had said the FDA was slow to react to the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
